:::Atma/Psuedo:::

Psuedo: Damn, why wont you die?!
Atma: No, that aint the best we got... we got this!
::They fire their weapons once again at him::




--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Soulstice Omega" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> Burning Hammer tries to block, but he isn't safe from the barrage 
of firepower. He looks at Atma and Psuedo afterwards, makes a very 
pained smile, breathing heavily, and says:
> 
> Burning Hammer: Ah...that the best you got?...
